trans-unit.source: (More information on the Adaptation product can be found on the Adaptation Page on the First Street Foundation API Data Dictionary )
trans-unit.target: （有关“适应”产品的更多信息，可以在“第一街基金会API数据字典”的“适应”页面上找到 ）

trans-unit.source: -p/--product PRODUCT: [REQUIRED] The product to call from the API
trans-unit.target: -p/--product PRODUCT -product PRODUCT：[必需]从API调用的产品

trans-unit.source: [-api_key/--api_key API_KEY]: [OPTIONAL] If step 1 is skipped or unavailable, this argument can take the API_KEY instead.
trans-unit.target: [-api_key/--api_key API_KEY] ：[可选]如果步骤1被跳过或不可用，则此参数可以采用 API_KEY 。

trans-unit.source: [-connection_limit/--connection_limit CONNECTION_LIMIT]: [OPTIONAL] The max number of concurrent connections to make the the API at the same time. This is does not affect the number of FSIDs that can be pulled. Defaults to 100 connections
trans-unit.target: [-connection_limit/--connection_limit CONNECTION_LIMIT] ：[可选]同时建立API的最大并发连接数。这不会影响可以提取的FSID的数量。默认为100个连接

trans-unit.source: [-e/--extra_param EXTRA_PARAM]: [OPTIONAL] Adds the argument to the end of the endpoint call
trans-unit.target: [-e/--extra_param EXTRA_PARAM] ：[可选]将参数添加到端点调用的末尾

trans-unit.source: [-event_id/--event_id EVENT_ID]: [OPTIONAL] The event id to use for the Historic Event Tile product
trans-unit.target: [-event_id/--event_id EVENT_ID] ：[可选]用于 Historic Event Tile 磁贴产品的事件ID

trans-unit.source: [-f/--file FILE]: [OPTIONAL] A file of Search Items (one per line) to search for with the product
trans-unit.target: [-f/--file FILE] ：[可选]要与产品一起搜索的搜索项文件（每行一个）

trans-unit.source: [-i/--search_items SEARCH_ITEM]: [OPTIONAL] The Search Items to search for with the product.
trans-unit.target: [-i/--search_items SEARCH_ITEM] ：[可选]要与产品一起搜索的搜索项。

trans-unit.source: [-l/--location LOOKUP_TYPE]: [OPTIONAL] The lookup location type (property, neighborhood, city, zcta, tract, county, cd, state)
trans-unit.target: [-l/--location LOOKUP_TYPE] ：[可选]查找位置类型（属性，邻里，城市，zcta，地区，县，cd，州）

trans-unit.source: [-log/--log LOG]: [OPTIONAL] To log info output to the console or not. Defaults to True
trans-unit.target: [-log/--log LOG] ：[可选]是否将信息输出记录到控制台。默认为True

trans-unit.source: [-return_period/--return_period RETURN_PERIOD]: [OPTIONAL] The return period to use for the Probability Depth Tile product
trans-unit.target: [-return_period/--return_period RETURN_PERIOD] ：[可选]用于“ Probability Depth Tile 产品的返回周期

trans-unit.source: [-v/--version VERSION]: [OPTIONAL] The version of the API to call. Defaults to the current version.
trans-unit.target: [-v/--version VERSION] ：[可选]要调用的API版本。默认为当前版本。

trans-unit.source: [-year/--year YEAR]: [OPTIONAL] The year to use for the Probability Depth Tile product
trans-unit.target: [-year/--year YEAR] ：[可选] Probability Depth Tile 产品使用的年份

trans-unit.source: get_chance(search_items list/file, csv bool, [connection_limit int=100], [output_dir str='cwd'], [extra_param str=None]) - Returns an array of Probability Chance product for the given IDs, and optionally creates a csv file. Arguments provided to extra_param will be appened to the end of the endpoint call
trans-unit.target: get_chance （search_items list/file ，csv bool ，[connection_limit int=100 ]，[output_dir str='cwd' ]，[extra_param str=None ]）-返回给定ID的 Probability Chance 乘积数组，并可选地创建一个csv文件。提供给 extra_param 的参数将应用于端点调用的末尾

trans-unit.source: get_count(search_items list/file, location_type string, csv bool, [connection_limit int=100], [output_dir str='cwd'], [extra_param str=None]) - Returns an array of Probability Count product for the given IDs, location_type, and optionally creates a csv file. Arguments provided to extra_param will be appened to the end of the endpoint call
trans-unit.target: get_count （search_items list/file ，location_type string ，csv bool ，[connection_limit int=100 ]，[output_dir str='cwd' ]，[extra_param str=None ]）-返回给定ID的 Probability Count 乘积数组，location_type ，并可以选择创建一个csv文件。提供给 extra_param 的参数将应用于端点调用的末尾

trans-unit.source: get_count_summary(search_items list/file, csv bool, [connection_limit int=100], [output_dir str='cwd'], [extra_param str=None]) - Returns an array of Probability Count-Summary product for the given IDs, and optionally creates a csv file. Arguments provided to extra_param will be appened to the end of the endpoint call
trans-unit.target: get_count_summary （搜索项 list/file ，csv bool ，[connection_limit int=100 ]，[output_dir str='cwd' ]，[extra_param str=None ]）-返回给定ID的 Probability Count-Summary 乘积数组，并可选创建一个csv文件。提供给 extra_param 的参数将应用于端点调用的末尾

trans-unit.source: get_cumulative(search_items list/file, csv bool, [connection_limit int=100], [output_dir str='cwd'], [extra_param str=None]) - Returns an array of Probability Cumulative product for the given IDs, and optionally creates a csv file. Arguments provided to extra_param will be appened to the end of the endpoint call
trans-unit.target: get_cumulative （搜索项 list/file ，csv bool ，[connection_limit int=100 ]，[output_dir str='cwd' ]，[extra_param str=None ]）-返回给定ID的 Probability Cumulative 乘积数组，并有选择地创建一个csv文件。提供给 extra_param 的参数将应用于端点调用的末尾

trans-unit.source: get_depth(search_items list/file, csv bool, [connection_limit int=100], [output_dir str='cwd'], [extra_param str=None]) - Returns an array of Probability Depth product for the given IDs, and optionally creates a csv file. Arguments provided to extra_param will be appened to the end of the endpoint call
trans-unit.target: get_depth （search_items list/file ，csv bool ，[connection_limit int=100 ]，[output_dir str='cwd' ]，[extra_param str=None ]）-返回给定ID的 Probability Depth 乘积数组，并有选择地创建一个csv文件。提供给 extra_param 的参数将应用于端点调用的末尾

trans-unit.source: get_detail(search_items list/file, location_type string, csv bool, [connection_limit int=100], [output_dir str='cwd'], [extra_param str=None]) - Returns an array of Location Detail product for the given IDs, location_type, and optionally creates a csv file. Arguments provided to extra_param will be appened to the end of the endpoint call
trans-unit.target: get_detail （搜索项 list/file ，location_type string ，csv bool ，[connection_limit int=100 ]，[output_dir str='cwd' ]，[extra_param str=None ]）-返回给定ID， Location Detail 产品的数组，并可以选择创建一个csv文件。提供给 extra_param 的参数将应用于端点调用的末尾

trans-unit.source: get_details_by_location(search_items list/file, location_type string, csv bool, [connection_limit int=100], [output_dir str='cwd'], [extra_param str=None]) - Returns an array of Adaptation Project product for the given IDs, location_type, and optionally creates a csv file. Arguments provided to extra_param will be appened to the end of the endpoint call
trans-unit.target: get_details_by_location （搜索项 list/file ，location_type string ，csv bool ，[connection_limit int=100 ]，[output_dir str='cwd' ]，[extra_param str=None ]）-返回给定ID， Adaptation Project 产品的数组，location_type ，并可以选择创建一个csv文件。提供给 extra_param 的参数将应用于端点调用的末尾

trans-unit.source: get_event(search_items list/file, csv bool, [connection_limit int=100], [output_dir str='cwd'], [extra_param str=None]) - Returns an array of Historic Event product for the given historic IDs, and optionally creates a csv file. Arguments provided to extra_param will be appened to the end of the endpoint call
trans-unit.target: get_event （search_items list/file ，csv bool ，[connection_limit int=100 ]，[output_dir str='cwd' ]，[extra_param str=None ]）-返回给定历史ID的 Historic Event 产品数组，并可以选择创建CSV文件。提供给 extra_param 的参数将应用于端点调用的末尾

trans-unit.source: get_events_by_location(search_items list/file, location_type string, csv bool, [connection_limit int=100], [output_dir str='cwd'], [extra_param str=None]) - Returns an array of Historic Detail product for the given IDs, location_type, and optionally creates a csv file. Arguments provided to extra_param will be appened to the end of the endpoint call
trans-unit.target: get_events_by_location （搜索项 list/file ，location_type string ，csv bool ，[connection_limit int=100 ]，[output_dir str='cwd' ]，[extra_param str=None ]）-返回给定ID， Historic Detail 产品的数组，location_type ，并可以选择创建一个csv文件。提供给 extra_param 的参数将应用于端点调用的末尾

trans-unit.target: get_historic_event （ tuple of int 坐标元组，event_id int ，图像 bool ，[connection_limit int=100 ]，[output_dir str='cwd' ]，[extra_param str=None ]）-返回给定坐标的 Historic Event Tile 产品数组，并可选地创建图像文件

trans-unit.source: get_nfip(search_items list/file, location_type string, csv bool, [connection_limit int=100], [output_dir str='cwd'], [extra_param str=None]) - Returns an array of Fema NFIP product for the given IDs, location_type, and optionally creates a csv file. Arguments provided to extra_param will be appened to the end of the endpoint call
trans-unit.target: get_nfip （搜索项 list/file ，location_type string ，csv bool ，[connection_limit int=100 ]，[output_dir str='cwd' ]，[extra_param str=None ]）-返回给定ID的 Fema NFIP 产品数组，location_type ，并可以选择创建一个csv文件。提供给 extra_param 的参数将应用于端点调用的末尾

trans-unit.source: get_precipitation(search_items list/file, csv bool, [connection_limit int=100], [output_dir str='cwd'], [extra_param str=None]) - Returns an array of Environmental Precipitation product for the given county IDs, and optionally creates a csv file. Arguments provided to extra_param will be appened to the end of the endpoint call
trans-unit.target: get_precipitation （搜索项目 list/file ，csv bool ，[connection_limit int=100 ]，[output_dir str='cwd' ]，[extra_param str=None ]）-返回给定县ID的 Environmental Precipitation 产品数组，并可以选择创建CSV文件。提供给 extra_param 的参数将应用于端点调用的末尾

trans-unit.source: get_probability_depth(coordinate tuple of int, year int, return_period int, image bool, [connection_limit int=100], [output_dir str='cwd'], [extra_param str=None]) - Returns an array of Probability Depth Tile product for the given coordinates, and optionally creates an image file
trans-unit.target: get_probability_depth （坐标 tuple of int ，年 int ，return_period int ，图像 bool ，[connection_limit int=100 ]，[OUTPUT_DIR str='cwd' ]，[extra_param str=None ]） -返回的数组 Probability Depth Tile 的产品给定坐标，并可以选择创建图像文件

trans-unit.source: get_project(search_items list/file, csv bool, [connection_limit int=100], [output_dir str='cwd'], [extra_param str=None]) - Returns an array of Adaptation Project product for the given adaptation IDs, and optionally creates a csv file. Arguments provided to extra_param will be appened to the end of the endpoint call

trans-unit.source: NOTE THE LIST MUST BE A SEPRATED WITH A SEMICOLON (;) INSTEAD OF A COMMA
trans-unit.target: 注意该列表必须以分号（;）代替逗号

trans-unit.source: NOTE: This project requires Python 3.7+ to run.
trans-unit.target: 注意：此项目需要Python 3.7+才能运行。

trans-unit.source: Note that the separator for each item must be a semicolon ;
trans-unit.target: 请注意，每个项目的分隔符必须是分号 ;

trans-unit.target: 视窗

trans-unit.source: [Reminder] Keep your API key safe, and do not share it with others!
trans-unit.target: [提醒]请确保您的API密钥安全，不要与他人共享！

trans-unit.source: A Python API Access Client for the First Street Foundation API
trans-unit.target: 第一街基金会API的Python API访问客户端

trans-unit.source: A more detailed and in-depth guide on how to install Python can be found here
trans-unit.target: 可在此处找到有关如何安装Python的更详细和深入的指南

trans-unit.source: Adaptation
trans-unit.target: 适应

trans-unit.source: Adaptation detail Extraction to CSV Through the Client:
trans-unit.target: 适应细节 通过客户端提取到CSV。

trans-unit.source: Add the following to the top of the file before the client initialization to allow the jupyter notebook and download loops to work correctly
trans-unit.target: 在客户端初始化之前，将以下内容添加到文件顶部，以使jupyter笔记本和下载循环正常工作

trans-unit.source: Address (string): Pass the address in your request to retrieve a reverse geocode location lookup. LocationType is required for address lookup. An address can be a city name, home address, or business address. City and State need to be included within the address query. Example Address: New York, NY
trans-unit.target: 地址（ string ）：在您的请求中传递地址以检索反向地理编码位置查找。查找地址需要LocationType。地址可以是城市名称，家庭住址或公司地址。地址查询中必须包含城市和州。示例地址： New York, NY

trans-unit.source: Any product above can be additionally exported to a CSV file for further usage if the csv boolean is set during the product call, or any call using the command line. The extracted can be found in the output_data directory of the project folder (if at least one CSV has been extracted).
trans-unit.target: 如果在产品调用或使用命令行的任何调用中设置了csv布尔值，则上述任何产品都可以另外导出到CSV文件，以供进一步使用。提取的文件可以在项目文件夹的 output_data 目录中找到（如果已提取至少一个CSV）。

trans-unit.source: Examples
trans-unit.target: 例子

trans-unit.source: FSID (int): The simplest type of lookup is a fsid lookup. If you know the fsid of the specific location, you can navigate directly to the specific product's information using the location's fsid. Example FSID: 18
trans-unit.target: FSID（ int ）：最简单的查找类型是fsid查找。如果您知道特定位置的fsid，则可以使用该位置的fsid直接导航到特定产品的信息。FSID示例： 18

trans-unit.source: Fema
trans-unit.target: Fema

trans-unit.source: First Street Foundation API Access Documentation (Python 3.7+)
trans-unit.target: 第一街基金会API访问文档 (Python 3.7+)

trans-unit.source: For every product, a list or file of search items must be provided to the product call. There are 3 types of search items corresponding to the 3 types of lookups. (More information on the Lookup types can be found on the Lookups Page on the First Street Foundation API Data Dictionary )
trans-unit.target: 对于每种产品，必须将 search items 的列表或文件提供给产品调用。有3种类型的 search items 对应于3种类型的查找。（有关查找类型的更多信息，可以在First Street Foundation API数据字典的“查找”页面上找到 ）

trans-unit.source: Go to the Python page (https://www.python.org/downloads/) and download then install Python version 3. Make sure that the checkbox is checked for Python to be added to the PATH
trans-unit.target: 转到Python页面（https://www.python.org/downloads/）并下载，然后安装Python版本3。请确保选中此复选框，以将Python添加到PATH。

trans-unit.source: Historic
trans-unit.target: 历史性的

trans-unit.source: If an update is made to this project, you will need to upgrade through PyPi
trans-unit.target: 如果这个项目有更新,你需要通过PyPi进行升级。

trans-unit.source: If any of the input FSIDs are invalid, a valid_id column will appear with the invalid FSIDs marked with False
trans-unit.target: 如果任何输入的FSID无效，则将显示一个 valid_id 列，其中的无效FSID标记为 False 。

trans-unit.source: If you are using Jupyter Notebook
trans-unit.target: 如果你正在使用Jupyter Notebook

trans-unit.source: Installation
trans-unit.target: 安装

trans-unit.source: Lat/Lng (tuple of int): Provide a tuple of latitude, longitude pairs will check to see if that point intersects within a boundary of a parcel from the database. Example lat/lng: (40.7079652311, -74.0021455387)
trans-unit.target: 纬度/经度（ tuple of int 的元组）：提供一个纬度的元组，经度对将检查该点是否在数据库中地块的边界内相交。纬度/经度示例： (40.7079652311, -74.0021455387)

trans-unit.target: 许可证

trans-unit.target: 地理位置

trans-unit.source: More information on each product can be found at the First Street Foundation API Data Dictionary
trans-unit.target: 有关每种产品的更多信息，请参见First Street Foundation API数据字典。

trans-unit.target: 通过命令行提取多个FSID到CSV。

trans-unit.source: OR
trans-unit.target: OR

trans-unit.source: Open a new powershell console / bash terminal, navigate to the project, and run the upgrade command:
trans-unit.target: 打开一个新的 powershell console / bash terminal ，导航到项目，然后运行upgrade命令：

trans-unit.source: Open/Re-open a powershell console / bash terminal and navigate to the project directory. Next, call one of the methods described below in the Products section through the command line. See the Examples section for more examples.
trans-unit.target: 打开/重新打开 powershell console / bash terminal ，然后导航到项目目录。接下来，通过命令行调用下面在“ Products 部分中描述的方法之一。有关更多示例，请参见 Examples 部分。

trans-unit.source: Probability
trans-unit.target: 概率

trans-unit.source: Products
trans-unit.target: 产品介绍

trans-unit.source: Run the python script.
trans-unit.target: 运行python脚本。

trans-unit.source: Running the Project - Method 1: Through the Command Line
trans-unit.target: 运行项目--方法1:通过命令行。

trans-unit.source: Running the Project - Method 2: Through the Client
trans-unit.target: 运行项目--方法2:通过客户来运行项目

trans-unit.source: Search Item:
trans-unit.target: 搜索项目。

trans-unit.source: Single FSID Extraction Through the Client:
trans-unit.target: 通过客户端提取单个FSID。

trans-unit.source: Single FSID Extraction to CSV Through the Command Line:
trans-unit.target: 通过命令行将单个FSID提取为CSV。

trans-unit.source: Table of contents
trans-unit.target: 目录

trans-unit.source: The Adaptation API provides Summary and Project data for the given SearchItems.
trans-unit.target: Adaptation API为给定的SearchItem提供 Summary 和 Project 数据。
环境API提供给定SearchItem的 Precipitation 数据。（有关“环境沉淀”产品的更多信息，请参见第一街基金会API数据字典上的“环境沉淀”页面 ）
Fema API为给定的SearchItems提供 NFIP 数据。（有关Fema NFIP产品的更多信息，可以在First Street Foundation API数据字典的Fema NFIP页面上找到 ）

trans-unit.source: The First Street Foundation API Access (Python) is a wrapper used to bulk extract flood data from the First Street Foundation API
trans-unit.target: 第一街基金会API访问(Python)是一个包装器,用于从第一街基金会API中批量提取洪水数据。
Flood Tiles产品可以通过在Flood Tile上分层来自定义地图。（有关Tile产品的更多信息，请参见First Street Foundation API数据字典的Tile页面上 ）
历史API为给定的SearchItems提供 Summary 和 Event 数据。（有关历史产品的更多信息，请参见第一街基金会API数据字典的“历史页面”上 ）
Location API提供给定SearchItems的 Detail 和 Summary 数据。（有关“位置”产品的更多信息，可以在“第一街基金会API数据字典”的“位置”页面上找到 ）
概率API为给定的SearchItems提供 Depth ， Chance ， Cumulative ， Count 数据。（有关“概率”产品的更多信息，可以在“第一街基金会API数据字典”的“概率”页面上找到 ）

trans-unit.source: The contents of the CSV file will follow similar formats as the First Street Foundation API - V1.0 Overview and Dictionary, but all lists will be expanded to a flat file. For any values that are null or not available, <NA> will be used.
trans-unit.target: CSV文件的内容将遵循与 First Street Foundation API - V1.0 Overview and Dictionary 相似的格式，但是所有列表都将扩展为平面文件。对于任何为空或不可用的值，将使用 <NA> 。

trans-unit.source: The file name will be in the format of YYYY_MM_DD_HH_mm_SS_product_subtype_lookup.csv.
trans-unit.target: 文件名将采用 YYYY_MM_DD_HH_mm_SS_product_subtype_lookup.csv 的格式。

trans-unit.source: The project is now setup and can be ran through one of the two methods below. See Products for additional details on how to extract flood data products from the API.
trans-unit.target: 现在，该项目已设置，可以通过以下两种方法之一运行。有关如何从API提取洪水数据产品的更多详细信息，请参见 Products 。

trans-unit.source: The project should now be updated to the newest version
trans-unit.target: 该项目现在应该更新到最新的版本。

trans-unit.source: Tile
trans-unit.target: 瓷砖

trans-unit.source: Tiles
trans-unit.target: 瓷砖

trans-unit.source: Updating the Project to the Newest Version:
trans-unit.target: 将项目更新到最新版本。

trans-unit.source: Use pip to install the project
trans-unit.target: 使用pip安装项目

trans-unit.source: [NOTE] This method will NOT generate a CSV by default. An argument must be passed to generate a CSV.
trans-unit.target: [注意]默认情况下，此方法不会生成CSV。必须传递参数以生成CSV。

trans-unit.source: [NOTE] This method will always generate a CSV.
trans-unit.target: [注意]此方法将始终生成CSV。

trans-unit.source: [Optional] Open a new powershell console / bash terminaland create and activate a new virtual environment in the project directory:
trans-unit.target: [可选]打开一个新的 powershell console / bash terminal ，并在项目目录中创建并激活一个新的虚拟环境：

trans-unit.source: [Required] Open a bash terminal and set an Environmental Variable with the variable_name as FSF_API_KEY and the variable_value with the API_KEY with the command
trans-unit.target: [必需]打开 bash terminal 并使用以下命令将环境变量的 variable_name 为 FSF_API_KEY ，将 variable_value 设置为 API_KEY

trans-unit.source: [Required] Set an Environmental Variable with the variable_name as FSF_API_KEY and the variable_value with the API_KEY.
trans-unit.target: [必需]设置的环境变量与 variable_name 作为 FSF_API_KEY 和 variable_value 与 API_KEY 。

trans-unit.source: api_key string: The assigned API key to access the API.
trans-unit.target: api_key string ：分配的用于访问API的API密钥。

trans-unit.source: log bool= True: Setting for whether to log info or not. Defaults to True.
trans-unit.target: log bool= True ：设置是否记录信息。默认为True。

trans-unit.source: version string= v1: The version of the API to access. Defaults to the current version.
trans-unit.target: version string= v1 ：要访问的API版本。默认为当前版本。
